content: vander stitches simple socks the simple socks are knit using magic loop and build on foundational skills the simple socks were the second design of the textured collection by vander stitches focusing on creating a customizable and cozy wardrobe this pattern was designed for christmas morning to wear with my family essentials needles & notions yarn 400 yards 100 g of 2 75 mm circular needles fingering weight 4 ply 80 cm sock yarn scissors sample done with west stitch markers yorkshire spinners optional cable needle signature 4 ply yarn optional crochet hook gauge designed for circumference of sock us women s size 6-10 60 knits= 7 5 inches 1 s o c k d e s i g n s o c k d e s i g n the cuff the cuff is firm yet stretchy and helps keep the sock in place the leg the leg is customized to desired height the gusset the gusset is where the sock will increase and decrease to fit your heel the foot the foot is customised to the length of your foot the heel turn the heel turn is where you turn your sock to fit the curve of your heel using german short row the heel flap the heel flap extends the sock to the length of your foot the toe the toe of the sock slowly expands to follow the natural line of the foot 2 abbreviation technique for additional /tbl through back loop support check out my instagram /wyib with yarn in back @vanderstitches /wyif with yarn in front for videos on specific k knit techniques used kfb knit front and back needle b needle for bottom of sock needle t needle for top of sock p2tog purl two together pass slipped stitch over the psso knit stich rs right side skip one stitch and leave on sk1 orginal needle skl slip knit lift sl1p slip one purlwise ssk slip slip knit st stitch ws wrong side x #
